definition: senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel

sentences.english: Of good conduct is the Order of the disciples of the Exalted One;
sentences.chinese: 良好行为是对师尊弟子的诫命。

sentences.english: Master is also working hard for the next generation.
sentences.chinese: 师尊为下一代努力工作。

sentences.english: Master is our spiritual leader around the world.
sentences.chinese: 师尊是我们全世界的灵性导师。

sentences.english: Now I would like to thank you Master for giving me this opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 我希望感谢师尊给予我这个机会。

sentences.english: The war my master. The death my love.
sentences.chinese: 战争吾师尊，死亡吾爱人。

sentences.english: Have not, this no the pedagogue got ache, I truly worry.
sentences.chinese: 没有啊，这不师尊受伤了，我很担心嘛。

sentences.english: And Master also has a lot of dynamic and educated young Sangha around Him.
sentences.chinese: 而师尊亦有很多活跃和受教育的青年僧伽在祂身边。

sentences.english: Bhagavan Master Zhi-Ji Vimalakirti is our great leader.
sentences.chinese: 薄伽梵智及维摩诘师尊是我们伟大的领袖。

sentences.english: Bhagavan Master, yesterday, we all have chat with disciple's grandma.
sentences.chinese: 薄伽梵师尊，昨天我们所有人与弟子的祖母聊天。

sentences.english: Master Bhagavan Zhi-Ji Vimalakirti get this good opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 师尊薄伽梵智及维摩诘有这个好机会。

sentences.english: Our Master is already the middle way.
sentences.chinese: 我们的师尊已经是中道。

sentences.english: I hope that all of Master's followers will continue to work with the Master.
sentences.chinese: 我希望师尊所有的追随者，会继续跟师尊一起工作。

sentences.english: I hope that all of Master's followers will continue to work with the Master.
sentences.chinese: 我希望师尊所有的追随者，会继续跟师尊一起工作。

sentences.english: I would like in the future that we can discuss with the Master.
sentences.chinese: 我希望在未来能够跟师尊讨论。

definition: head of a clan/natural leader/person of prestige and authority in a domain/suzerain
young disciple (of the same master)/younger or junior male schoolmate
founder (of a craft, religious sect etc)
used for 師傅|师傅 (in Taiwan)/master/qualified worker
honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
junior female student or apprentice/daughter (younger than oneself) of one's teacher
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
